title: Did the person who died have assets outside the UK
question: Did {deceasedName} have assets outside the UK?
hint: This could be shares or property outside the UK. If so, you may need a copy of the grant of probate for use outside the UK.
legend: Did {deceasedName} have assets outside the UK?

required.summary: You haven’t answered the question about assets being held outside the UK
required.message: Answer ‘yes’ if the person who died had assets outside the UK
